page.title: 05SADBERGE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The village hall used to be the village school.In{1964}when the new school was built it was extended and is now used as our meeting place.The {senior citizens}have a meeting there on a Thursday.Doctor Andrews holds his {surgery}there on a Monday and Friday afternoon because we have no doctors surgery in the village.There is also {sewing,bingo,badminton}and a{dancing {class.}The best thing held there is the{Youth Club}to which I go. It is held on a Friday night.From 6.30 to 8.30.Most of the children in the village aged 5 to 15 go there.The boys can play football and the girls play basket ball or rounders.There is also snooker,table tennis and some of us like to make things such as masks or we draw pictures.There are drinks, crisps and sweets for us to buy.We all have a great time By Clare Dickens(10)
